original: PAULSSON, Nils Axel Verner, Bergsingenjör, Stockholm, f Malmö 23/3 89 av revisor N P o Anna Andersson, gm Götha Esselius. Mog.ex NReal Sthlm 07, bergsingex KTH 11. Kem v Jernkont:s försöksverk i Trollhättan o bitr verkst.ing v AB L M Ericsson Sthlm 11, driftsing v Thermo-Electric Ore Reduction Corp i Luton Engl 12—13, försäljn.ing h Oscar Dieden Sthlm 14, metallurg h AB Elektr Ugnar Sthlm o h dess amerik repr Hamilton & Hansell New York City 15—18, metallurg h Ludlum Steel Co i Watervliet NY samt konsult ing h fmorna Metal Alloys Ltd i Watervliet o Corning & Co i New York City 18—25, presid f Uddeholm Co of America Inc New York City 25—27, ass general manager v Ludlum Steel Co Watervliet NY 28—30, övering v Avesta Jvks AB i Avesta 30—37, tekn dir h A Johnson & Co, Sthlm o London 37—38, tekn dir h Refined Stainless Steel Co, Sheffield, England, 38—39, metallurg h Gullspångs Elektrokem AB 40—42, nu konsult ing h John-sonkoncernen, Sthlm. Proj, konstr, uppfört o igångsatt stålverk i Riberao Preto i Brasilien f Corning & Co i New York City 20—23. V. ordf i Avesta stads arbetslöshetskté 33. Sekr i American Soc of Sw Engineers i Brooklyn NY 26—27, v. chairman i Schenectady Chapter of American Metals Soc 29. PAUL S S ÖN, Elof Bertil, Fabrikör, Vara, f Vara 30/5 18 av fabr O P o Berta Johansson, gm Siw Rydén. Realsk, Filip Holmqvist» hdlsinst. Anst AB Vänersborgsbkn 37, AB Wiskadals Fabr Borås 38, Mineralvattenfabr Vara (gr av disp K O Paulsson 96, övrt av P:s far 18, av P 42) sed. 39, ag o vkst dir dna. Ag fastigh Vara. Styr.led AB Vara Tegelbr. Resor: Danm, Norge 36. Hobbies: Pistolskjutning, filateli.
translated:
PAULSSON, Nils Axel Verner, Mining Engineer, Stockholm, b. Malmö 23/3 89 to auditor N P and Anna Andersson, m. Götha Esselius. Graduated from NReal Sthlm 07, mining engineering from KTH 11. Worked in the experimental plant of Jernkont: in Trollhättan and as assistant engineer at AB L M Ericsson Sthlm 11. Served as a process engineer at Thermo-Electric Ore Reduction Corp in Luton, England 12-13, sales engineer at Oscar Dieden Sthlm 14, metallurgist at AB Elektr Ugnar Sthlm and its American representative Hamilton & Hansell New York City 15-18, metallurgist at Ludlum Steel Co in Watervliet NY and consulting engineer at Metal Alloys Ltd in Watervliet and Corning & Co in New York City 18-25. President of Uddeholm Co of America Inc New York City 25-27, assistant general manager at Ludlum Steel Co Watervliet NY 28-30, superintendent at Avesta Jvks AB in Avesta 30-37, technical director at A Johnson & Co, Sthlm and London 37-38, technical director at Refined Stainless Steel Co, Sheffield, England, 38-39, metallurgist at Gullspångs Elektrokem AB 40-42, currently a consulting engineer at the Johnson Group, Sthlm. Planned, designed, constructed, and started the steel plant in Riberao Preto, Brazil, for Corning & Co in New York City 20-23. Vice chairman of the Avesta city unemployment board 33. Secretary of the American Society of Swedish Engineers in Brooklyn NY 26-27, vice chairman of the Schenectady Chapter of the American Metals Society 29.

PAUL S S ÖN, Elof Bertil, Manufacturer, Vara, b. Vara 30/5 18 to factory owner O P and Berta Johansson, m. Siw Rydén. Attended Realsk, Filip Holmqvist commercial institute. Employed at AB Vänersborgsbkn 37, AB Wiskadals Fabr Borås 38, Mineralvattenfabr Vara (part owner by K O Paulsson 96, inherited by P's father in 18, by P in 42) since 39, currently serving as CEO and business manager. Also involved in real estate in Vara. Board member of AB Vara Tegelbr. Traveled to Denmark and Norway in 36. Hobbies: Pistol shooting, philately.
